Summaries.eng: The adventures of four very brave Infinity Nado players.

Aliases: Zhandou Wang Zhi Jufeng Zhan Hun
King of Warrior: Jufeng Zhan Hun
Battle King of Hurricane War Spirit

Titles.zho: 战斗 王 之 飓风 战 魂

Summaries.eng: Human beings have polluted the sky, the sea and even the land they live in. One day, a gigantic gyroscopic tower similar to a spinning top falls from space, which ends up destroying a large part of Earth's civilization while the survivors begin a hard life around the tower, which will give them a mysterious power, that of the Nado, particular spinning tops. So the protagonists begin to challenge each other, but someone plots in the shadows to use the powers of the Nado for evil purposes.
Summaries.zho: 人類已經污染了天空，海洋，甚至他們居住的土地。一天，一座巨大的陀螺塔像一個旋轉的陀螺從太空墜落，最終摧毀了地球的大部分文明，而倖存者開始艱苦的生活 圍繞著塔，這將賦予他們Nado的神秘力量，尤其是旋轉陀螺。 因此，主角們開始互相挑戰，但是有人在陰影中密謀利用Nado的力量作惡用途。

Titles.zho: 战斗 王 之 飓风 战 魂 2

Summaries.eng: After the gigantic gyroscopic tower returned to space, the city of Fenglun began to gradually regain its prosperity and vitality, and therefore peace seems to finally reign. The protagonists have returned to live their old lives, which leads them to separate for a while, however a relic far from the city is mutating and a powerful elven force has begun to storm the place by running a torrential rain. , bringing more disasters. Meanwhile, a mysterious character named Pandora appears on the scene. So the group of friends will have to reform once again to restore order.
Summaries.zho: 巨大的陀螺塔返回太空後，鳳倫市開始逐漸恢復繁榮與活力，因此和平似乎終於佔了上風。 主角們恢復了原有的生活，這使他們分開了一段時間，但是遠離城市的遺物正在變異，強大的精靈部隊開始通過暴雨襲擊該地。 ，帶來更多的災難。 同時，一個名叫潘多拉（Pandora）的神秘人物出現在現場。 因此，這組朋友將不得不再次進行改革以恢復秩序。

Titles.zho: 战斗 王 之 飓风 战 魂 3

Summaries.eng: The story continues after the protagonists have stopped Pandora and lost all their memories by becoming mere players. Jin and his companions receive Nado from another dimension that will help them remember who they really are. Meanwhile, a new threat plots in the dark to take over the world.
Summaries.zho: 在主人公阻止潘多拉並成為純粹的玩家而失去所有記憶之後，故事繼續。 Jin和他的同伴從另一個維度接收Nado，這將幫助他們記住自己的真實身份。 同時，一個新的威脅陰暗地佔領了整個世界。
曾经充斥着大自然恩惠给人类的“元素能量”的战魂大陆上， 天才陀螺少年叶星云为了调查自己的身世，前往神秘的飓风学院，和新结识的小伙伴顾炎、易文轩、林小汐组队参加一年一度的飓风陀螺手争霸赛，在不经意间发现了一个不仅与叶星云身世有关，更牵扯到世界最强能量元素消失的重大秘密。叶星云和伙伴们在学院里认真学习陀螺对战知识，在一次次比赛中结下了深厚的友谊，并在伙伴们的陪同下展开了前往幻域的冒险旅途。
